CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The V oc is directly proportional to the incident light intensity in the semilogarithmic plot with a slope of kT / q , which describes bimolecular recombination in the BHJ film , where k represents the Boltzmann constant , T is the Kelvin temperature , and q is the elementary charge.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
|--------------|
| BHJ film |
| Boltzmann constant (k) |
| Kelvin temperature (T) |
| Elementary charge (q)

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
|--------------|
| BHJ film |

The other entities mentioned in the paragraph (Boltzmann constant, Kelvin temperature, and elementary charge) are not materials, but physical constants.
